nodes.text: A chieftain's hut stood in the Talz village on Orto Plutonia during the Clone Wars. It was home to the Talz chieftain Thi-Sen. It was where Jedi Generals Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker, later accompanied by Pantoran Chairman Chi Cho and Pantoran Senator Riyo Chuchi, met with Thi-Sen just prior to the Battle of Orto Plutonia in 22 BBY.
